metadata.title: CVE-2022-43034 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 v1.6.0-639. There is a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in the AP4_BitReader::SkipBits(unsigned int) function in mp42ts.

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
